bookTitle: A Bad Spell for the Worst Witch
plot: Mildred's good intentions in the second year are upset when she finds that Miss Hardbroom is to be her form teacher again. She clashes once again with Ethel who turns her into a frog, whilst later on she rescues an enchanted magician.
characters: Enid Nightshade, Mildred Hubble, Maud Spellbody, Miss Cackle, Miss Hardbroom, Ethel Hallow, Egbert Hellibore, Algernon Rowan-Webb, Tabby (Worst Witch), Griselda Blackwood
